resources.string: AppTurbo was founded in 2011 based on one simple idea. Now we are live worldwide and available in 15 languages.\n\nWith over 50 employees and 15 different nationalities, we create unique and exciting content daily for our 36 millions users. And the smile is included.
"My name is Takou Syntiche N'DONGO, I am 24 years old. I do this test with the goal of obtaining an internship at Appturbo from September 2016 to February 2017."
